articles.title: AIFF to hire chartered flight to take Indian football team to Abha for Afghanistan game - Khel Now
articles.description: AIFF have decided to hire a chartered flight to take the Indian football team to Abha for the Afghanistan game in World Cup Qualifiers.
articles.content: AIFF President, Mr. Kalyan Chaubey, had a meeting with Senior National Mens Team Coach, Mr. Igor Stimac, in Kolkata on Friday, March 8, 2024, about Indias upcoming matches in the FIFA World Cup quali… [+3081 chars]
